title: Duckweed: The low-down on a tiny plant

title_detail.value: Duckweed: The low-down on a tiny plant

summary: Researchers have found why the giant duckweed has a low genetic diversity despite its large population size: low mutation rates contribute to low genetic diversity. The results are relevant for future studies on the evolution of plants and will accelerate the use of duckweeds both for basic research and industrial applications.
